00011 template<class T>
00012 class Const_NullValue
00013 {
00014 public:
00015     inline operator T()const
00016     {
00017         return (T)0;
00018     }
00019     inline operator int()const
00020     {
00021         return (int)0;
00022     }
00023 };
00024 
00025 template<class ElemT,class NullValue = Const_NullValue<ElemT> >
00026 class DynamicArray
00027 {
00028 public:
00029     typedef ElemT element_type;
00030 public:
00031     DynamicArray(void);
00032 
00033     DynamicArray(int32_t blkSize_);
00034 
00035     DynamicArray(size_t initSize,int32_t blkSize_);
00036 
00037     DynamicArray(const DynamicArray& src);
00038 
00039     ~DynamicArray(void);
00040 public:
00041     class DynamicArrayIterator
00042     {
00043     public:
00044         DynamicArrayIterator(DynamicArray<ElemT,NullValue>* pparent)
00045                 :pParent_(pparent)
00046                 ,curBlk_(-1)
00047                 ,curOffset_(-1)
00048         {
00049         }
00050         DynamicArrayIterator(const DynamicArrayIterator& clone)
00051                 :pParent_(clone.pParent_)
00052                 ,curBlk_(clone.curBlk_)
00053                 ,curOffset_(clone.curOffset_)
00054         {
00055         }
00056         ~DynamicArrayIterator() {}
00057     public:
00058         bool next()
00059         {
00060             if (curBlk_ == -1)
00061             {
00062                 curBlk_ = pParent_->blkBase_;
00063                 while (!pParent_->blocks_[curBlk_] && (curBlk_ < pParent_->numBlks_) )
00064                     curBlk_++;
00065                 if (curBlk_ >= pParent_->numBlks_)
00066                     return false;
00067             }
00068             do
00069             {
00070                 curOffset_++;
00071                 if (curOffset_ >= pParent_->blkSize_)
00072                 {
00073                     curBlk_++;
00074                     while (!pParent_->blocks_[curBlk_] && (curBlk_ < pParent_->numBlks_) )
00075                         curBlk_++;
00076                     if (curBlk_>=pParent_->numBlks_)
00077                         return false;
00078                     curOffset_ = 0;
00079                 }
00080             }
00081             while (pParent_->blocks_[curBlk_][curOffset_] == (ElemT)NullValue());
00082 
00083             return true;
00084         }
00085         element_type element()
00086         {
00087             return pParent_->blocks_[curBlk_][curOffset_];
00088         }
00089         size_t position()
00090         {
00091             return curBlk_*pParent_->blkSize_ + curOffset_;
00092         }
00093     private:
00094         DynamicArray<ElemT,NullValue>*pParent_;
00095         int32_t                         curBlk_;
00096         int32_t                         curOffset_;
00097     };
00098 
00099     typedef DynamicArrayIterator array_iterator;
00100 public:
00101     ElemT& operator[](size_t order);
00102

00122

00125     ElemT** blocks_;
00126     int32_t     blkSize_;
00127     int32_t     blkBase_;
00128     int32_t     numBlks_;
00129     size_t maxLength_;
00130     boost::auto_alloc alloc_;
00131 };

00134 template<class ElemT,class NullValue>
00135 DynamicArray<ElemT,NullValue>::DynamicArray(void)
00136         :blkSize_(DYNARRAY_DEFAULTBLKSIZE)
00137         ,blkBase_(0)
00138         ,numBlks_(1)
00139         ,maxLength_(DYNARRAY_DEFAULTBLKSIZE)
00140 {
00141     blocks_ = new ElemT*[numBlks_];
00142     blocks_[0] = NULL;
00143 }

00145 template<class ElemT,class NullValue>
00146 DynamicArray<ElemT,NullValue>::DynamicArray(int32_t blksize)
00147         :blkSize_(blksize)
00148         ,blkBase_(0)
00149         ,numBlks_(1)
00150         ,maxLength_(blksize)
00151 {
00152     //blocks_ = new ElemT*[numBlks_];
00153     blocks_ = BOOST_NEW(alloc_, ElemT*);
00154     blocks_[0] = NULL;
00155 }
00156 template<class ElemT,class NullValue>
00157 DynamicArray<ElemT,NullValue>::DynamicArray(size_t initSize,int32_t blksize)
00158         :blkSize_(blksize)
00159         ,blkBase_(0)
00160         ,maxLength_(initSize)
00161 {
00162     numBlks_ = (int32_t)((initSize + blksize - 1)/blksize);
00163     //blocks_ = new ElemT*[numBlks_];
00164     blocks_ = BOOST_NEW(alloc_, ElemT*);
00165     
00166     memset(blocks_,0,numBlks_*sizeof(ElemT*));
00167 }
00168 
00169 template<class ElemT,class NullValue>
00170 DynamicArray<ElemT,NullValue>::DynamicArray(const DynamicArray& src)
00171 {
00172     blkSize_ = src.blkSize_;
00173     blkBase_ = src.blkBase_;
00174     numBlks_ = src.numBlks_;
00175     maxLength_ = src.maxLength_;
00176     blocks_ = new ElemT*[numBlks_];
00177     memcpy(blocks_,src.blocks_,numBlks_*sizeof(ElemT*));
00178     for (int32_t i = 0;i<numBlks_;i++)
00179     {
00180         allocBlock(i);
00181         memcpy(blocks_[i],src.blocks_[i],blkSize_*sizeof(ElemT));
00182     }
00183 }

00185 template<class ElemT,class NullValue>
00186 DynamicArray<ElemT,NullValue>::~DynamicArray(void)
00187 {
00188     clear();
00189 }

00191 template<class ElemT,class NullValue>
00192 ElemT& DynamicArray<ElemT,NullValue>::operator[](size_t order)
00193 {
00194     int32_t blk = block(order);
00195     int32_t off = offset(order);
00196 
00197 //    if (order >= maxLength_)
00198     if(blk >= numBlks_)
00199         grow(order+1);
00200     if (blocks_[blk] == NULL)
00201         allocBlock(blk);
00202     return blocks_[blk][off];
00203 }
00204 
00205 template<class ElemT,class NullValue>
00206 ElemT DynamicArray<ElemT,NullValue>::getAt(size_t order)
00207 {
00208     if (order >= maxLength_)
00209         return NULL;
00210     int32_t blk = block(order);
00211     int32_t off = offset(order);
00212     if (blocks_[blk] == NULL)
00213         return NULL;
00214     return blocks_[blk][off];
00215 }

00217 template<class ElemT,class NullValue>
00218 typename DynamicArray<ElemT,NullValue>::array_iterator DynamicArray<ElemT,NullValue>::elements()

00220     return typename DynamicArray<ElemT,NullValue>::array_iterator(this);

00223 template<class ElemT,class NullValue>
00224 void DynamicArray<ElemT,NullValue>::insert(size_t order,const ElemT& val)
00225 {
00226     if (order >= maxLength_)
00227         grow(order+1);
00228     int32_t blk = block(order);
00229     int32_t off = offset(order);
00230     if (blocks_[blk] == NULL)
00231         allocBlock(blk);
00232     blocks_[blk][off] = val;
00233 }
00234 
00235 template<class ElemT,class NullValue>
00236 void DynamicArray<ElemT,NullValue>::grow(size_t newLen)
00237 {
00238     int32_t numBlks = (int32_t)((newLen + blkSize_ - 1)/blkSize_);
00239 
00240     ElemT** tmpBlks = new ElemT*[numBlks];
00241     memset(tmpBlks,0,numBlks*sizeof(ElemT*));
00242     memcpy(tmpBlks,blocks_,numBlks_*sizeof(ElemT*));
00243     delete[] blocks_;
00244     blocks_ = tmpBlks;
00245     numBlks_ = numBlks;
00246     maxLength_ = newLen;
00247 }
00248 
00249 template<class ElemT,class NullValue>
00250 void DynamicArray<ElemT,NullValue>::allocBlock(int32_t blk)
00251 {
00252     assert(blk<numBlks_);
00253     blocks_[blk] = new ElemT[blkSize_];
00254     for (int32_t i = 0;i<blkSize_;i++)
00255     {
00256         blocks_[blk][i] = NullValue();
00257     }
00258 }
00259 
00260 template<class ElemT,class NullValue>
00261 void DynamicArray<ElemT,NullValue>::clear()
00262 {
00263     if (blocks_)
00264     {
00265         for (int32_t i = 0;i<numBlks_;i++)
00266         {
00267             if (blocks_[i])
00268                 delete[] blocks_[i];
00269         }
00270         delete[] blocks_;
00271         blocks_ = NULL;
00272         numBlks_ = 0;
00273     }
00274     maxLength_ = 0;
00275 }
00276 template<class ElemT,class NullValue>
00277 void DynamicArray<ElemT,NullValue>::reset()
00278 {
00279     if (blocks_)
00280     {
00281         for (int32_t i = 0;i<numBlks_;i++)
00282         {
00283             if (blocks_[i])
00284             {
00285                 memset(blocks_[i],(int)NullValue(),blkSize_*sizeof(ElemT));
00286             }
00287         }
00288     }
00289 }
00291 //inline functions
00292 template<class ElemT,class NullValue>
00293 inline size_t DynamicArray<ElemT,NullValue>::length()
00294 {
00295     int32_t length = 0;
00296     for (int32_t i = 0;i<numBlks_;i++)
00297     {
00298         if (blocks_[i - blkBase_])
00299         {
00300             for (int32_t j = 0;j<blkSize_;j++)
00301                 if (blocks_[i - blkBase_][j] != (ElemT)NullValue())
00302                     length++;
00303         }
00304     }
00305     return length;
00306 }
00307 template<class ElemT,class NullValue>
00308 inline size_t DynamicArray<ElemT,NullValue>::setMaxlength(size_t newMaxLen)
00309 {
00310     if (newMaxLen > maxLength_)
00311     {
00312         grow(newMaxLen);
00313         return newMaxLen;
00314     }
00315     else return maxLength_;
00316 }
00317 template<class ElemT,class NullValue>
00318 inline int32_t DynamicArray<ElemT,NullValue>::block(size_t order)
00319 {
00320     return ((int32_t)(order/blkSize_) - blkBase_);
00321 }
00322 template<class ElemT,class NullValue>
00323 inline int32_t DynamicArray<ElemT,NullValue>::offset(size_t order)
00324 {
00325     return (int32_t)(order%blkSize_);
00326 }
